In Syria, plainclothes and uniformed police beat demonstrators and shove one into the trunk of a car.
In Morocco, thousands march for and against constitutional reforms proposed by King Mohammed.
In Yemen, anti - Saleh protesters hope a team of UN human rights investigators will condemn Saleh's handling of the protests.
Thousands of Shiites in Iraq make the annual pilgrimage to commemorate the death of Shiite holy man Imam Musa al-Kadhim.
In Zambia, dignitaries gather in Lusaka to pay their respects to the former president Frederick Chiluba.
1,000 runners from 20 countries participate in Kenya's annual Lewa marathon to raise funds for wildlife conservation.
